DOC.brief_summary: The purpose pilot study test durability response Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation ( TMS ) symptoms Complex Regional Pain Syndrome ( CRPS ) . The investigator test various method TMS vary lengths time pilot study investigate clinical impact .
DOC.criteria: Age 18 old Diagnosis CRPS ( complex regional pain syndrome ) Average pain level report Numerical Rating Scale meet entry criterion Ability perform experimental task procedure . MRI contraindication ( metal implant device , claustrophobia ) TMS Contraindication ( eg metal implant device near site stimulation ) History epilepsy History psychological psychiatric disorder would interfere study procedure , discretion researcher . Neurologic illness would interfere brain integrity Current medical condition medication use would interfere study procedure data integrity , discretion researcher . Currently pregnant plan become pregnant . On go legal action disability claim .
